product.title: Pure White & Oyster Wooden Blind With Tapes - 35mm Slat
product.description: Warming up the pure white wooden slat beautifully the oyster tape has a creamy oatmeal tone. This particular combination of wooden slat and tape brings the best of both worlds; crisp, fresh white colour that will coordinate with no end of furnishings and then a warmly coloure warming up the pure white wooden slat beautifully the oyster tape has a creamy oatmeal tone.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Smoke Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm smoke blue is a soft blue shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm smoke blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Dove Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm dove grey is a light soft grey shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm dove grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Soft Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The genesis plain luxe cream offers a simple and stylish enhancement for your windows. This practical roller blind is designed with convenience in mind. Whatever room you hang this blind will also benefit from the dimout effect and uplifting cream colourway that will give the space a bright splash of warmth whatever time of day. relproducts.title: Roma Pure - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The snowy white of the roma pure is fresh and cool, allowing plenty of light in from outside, yet offering privacy and neutrality. The fabric is lightweight and durable, making it the ideal option for a blind that could get a lot of use. Light, airy living rooms make beautiful entertainment spaces, and this blind will only help to set that off. The soft hue won't clash in an all-white environment, and also creates an excellent colour break when teamed with bright colours such as emerald greens, poppy reds, and sky blues.

relproducts.title: Richmond Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. The sleek, clean lines of the vertical blind complement the pattern perfectly, providing a handsome contrast between hard and soft. Place the pure in the bathroom, where its clean white hue will match a classic suite wonderfully. Keep the room bright and fresh by sticking to a one-colour palette, accenting only with silver fixtures and fittings for a contemporary feel.

relproducts.title: Decor Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: For a stylish window arrangement, choose the dcor in pure, where a fusion of silk-inspired threads craft a modest blind with creative arcs and elevated stitching. This brilliantly white fabric rests on movable louvres to allow you to control the amount of light and ventilation entering the room. For a delicately stylish kitchen with fresh and reviving colour, match the stark pure with peaceful duck egg blue hues.

relproducts.title: Henderson Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: In slightly raised stitching, the henderson pure displays subtle stripes on a smooth white canvas. The colour is a soft ice white with a clean and refreshing aesthetic and, hung in the vertical slats, looks streamlined and ordered. Hang the pure in your home office for a studious yet fresh look. Team with cool blues to continue the clean, contemporary theme, opting for light wooden furniture and floorboards, then adorning with throws, cushions, and accessories in subtle blues and whites.

relproducts.title: Rochester Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The striking rochester in pure contains both brilliant, white shade and mesmerising adornments. The dreamy, satin-like threads create a fascinating display of contrasting textures, producing a classy look, with the added benefit of adjustable louvres to allow both ventilation and privacy. To create a serene haven with calming hues, present the pure in your restroom amidst a soothing setting of cornflower blue.

relproducts.title: Roma Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Roma's pure filter blind is just that - pure, in the form a beautiful snow white. This lightly textured blind will allow light to trickle through whilst offering privacy and style when closed. But you can always use the adjustable louvres to open it, and let in all the light you want. Generate a clean and refreshing look in your bedroom by combining the pure with cool pastel blues or greens; or hang in a family bathroom alongside sea blues or soft aquas, and accessorise with silvers or golds depending on your preference.

relproducts.title: Amor Icing Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The amor pure is the next shade up from the amor snowfall in terms of whiteness. In keeping with its name, the amor pure is that slightly off-white colour of paper or fluffy white cloud. All blinds in the amor range are 100% blackout so they are perfect for blocking out the light in a bedroom. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

relproducts.title: Gloss Pure Brilliant White Real Wood
relproducts.description: The gloss range is the ultimate in sophistication; we have taken the timeless appearance of the wooden blind and given it a modern funky twist. This white gloss blind will add a stylish, fresh and crisp feel in any room in your home, the gloss finish adds an extra touch of chic. relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Pure White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of turin 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This pure white perfect fit venetian blind adds a fresh white shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with bright accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are a drill-free and screw-free way to fit blinds to a upvc window or door - ensuring the frame warranty is protected.

relproducts.title: Origin Magnolia - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

relproducts.description: This wooden blind is painted pure black and is a great choice for creating a statement at the window; the slats will draw attention to the window and the view beyond. The stark black slats will work well with all manner of interior designs from the traditional black and whit this wooden blind is painted pure black and is a great choice for creating a statement at the window; the slats will draw attention to the window and the view beyond.

relproducts.title: Pure Black & White Wooden Blind With Tapes - 50mm Slat
relproducts.description: This is a superb window blind for adding style, panache and drama; the black slats are transformed with tape in stark white for a striking contrast. This wooden blind will be a sensational addition to a tasteful home and if theres a room working a little mono-chrome style the this is a superb window blind for adding style, panache and drama; the black slats are transformed with tape in stark white for a striking contrast.

relproducts.description: This pure white painted slat is bright white and will reflect the light into the room giving a clean fresh style at the window. Always a popular choice for kitchens to coordinate with white units, this blind will also lend a tranquil air to a room, picture scandinavian themed this pure white painted slat is bright white and will reflect the light into the room giving a clean fresh style at the window.

relproducts.description: Their premium taped gloss pure white real wood blind features a sleek glossy finish, great for adding polished simplicity into a room. From soft creamy neutrals to trending greys and stone shades, this real wood range adds a modern sleek finish to your windows. A shade that never goes out of trend, this white wooden blind would adds a modern feel at a great price. relproducts.title: Satin Pure White Faux Wood Blind - 50mm Slat
relproducts.description: Theres nothing like the smooth matt finish of satin white and when it comes as a stunning wood impressions blind its even more stunning. We all know the benefits of white blinds at the window, they open things up, create space and illuminate the whole room at the same time a theres nothing like the smooth matt finish of satin white and when it comes as a stunning wood impressions blind its even more stunning.

relproducts.title: Pure White Wooden Blind - 64mm Slat
relproducts.description: For a clean and simple look this pure white painted blind is just the thing, and guess what, it really is pure white. The options are endless for this blind, hang it in any number of interior styles and for a clean and simple look this pure white painted blind is just the thing, and guess what, it really is pure white.
